#include<stdio.h>
#define M 1000001
char a[M];
long long sum[M];
int t,n;
inline int inp( )
{
int n=0;
int ch=getchar();
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){ ch=getchar();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
n = (n<<3)+(n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getchar();
return n;
}
inline void prime()
{
int i,j;
a[0]=1,a[1]=1;
for(i=3;i*i<=M;i+=2)
{
if(a[i]==0)
for(j=3;j*i<=M;j+=2)
a[j*i]=1;
}
for(i=4;i<M;i+=2)
a[i]=1;
sum[3]=5;
sum[2]=2;
for(i=5;i<=M;i+=2)
{
if(a[i]==0)
sum[i]=sum[i-2]+i;
else
sum[i]=sum[i-2];
}
}
int main(){
int t;
t=inp();
prime();
while(t--)
{
n=inp();
if(n%2)
{
    if(n==3)
	printf("2\n");
	else
	printf("%lld\n",sum[n-2]);
}
else
printf("%lld\n",sum[n-1]);
}
return 0;
}
